Name: Software Development
Description: Ability to design, develop, test, and maintain software applications using various programming languages and frameworks.

Name: Hardware Design
Description: Proficiency in designing and developing computer hardware components, including circuits, processors, and memory systems.

Name: Network Engineering
Description: Skills in designing, implementing, and managing computer networks, including LANs, WANs, and cloud-based networks.

Name: Cybersecurity
Description: Knowledge of protecting computer systems and networks from cyber threats through various security measures and protocols.

Name: Data Analysis
Description: Ability to collect, process, and analyze large datasets to extract meaningful insights and support decision-making.
